snippet.title: Bramble: The Mountain King - Official Behind the Scenes Trailer | The MIX Showcase March 2023
snippet.description:
Join a member of the development team from Dimfrost Studio for a deep dive into Bramble The Mountain King, including a discussion about the dark, Nordic fables that inspired the setting for the upcoming adventure game, as well as a couple of the creatures you'll encounter on your journey. 

Bramble the Mountain King will be available on PC (via Steam and the Epic Games Store), Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and Nintendo Switch on April 27, 2023.

#IGN #Gaming
